entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is described as horrible to Hermione and has a look of disdain when she sees Firenze.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being treated poorly by Umbridge and is concerned about Umbridge's behavior.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as eating breakfast and expressing skepticism about Umbridge's potential for further bad behavior.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as having appointed a new teacher without consulting Umbridge.

entities.name: firenze
entities.description: Firenze is described as part-human and is seen by Umbridge with disdain.

entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati is mentioned as bypassing the marble staircase with La vender.

entities.name: la vender
entities.description: La vender is mentioned as going into the entrance hall with Parvati.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as following Ron and others into the entrance hall.

entities.name: north tower
entities.description: The North Tower is mentioned as a potential destination for Harry and Ron.

relationships.description: Dumbledore appointed a new teacher without consulting Umbridge.
Hermione is concerned about Umbridge's potential for further bad behavior.
Ron was heading towards the North Tower with Harry and others.
Parvati went into the entrance hall with La vender.
